name: Stay Monke
description:
Reject Evolution, return to Monke.

Monke's hand will follow your mouse. Right click to grab. Grab the floor to MOVE. Grab random objects to THROW. 

Get Banana to STAY MONKE, get phone to evolve (don't). Throw object onto banana or phone will make them broken (and becomes object that can throw).

Reach the end to get to the banana mountain BEFORE fully evolve to human.

**NOTES**: Monke got long arm, human got short arm.

I was obsess with monke so I solo dev the whole game in 6 days (when I know this jam, already 6 days left), this is bad for health.

Go Godot Jam (https://itch.io/jam/go-godot-jam-3)

Play on gotm.io (https://gotm.io/stay-monke/reject-evolution)
